div.p: An Ammonios, den Strategen des Hêrakleidês-Bezirks des Arsinoïtês, und Harpokratiôn alias Hierax, den Königlichen Schreiber desselben Bezirks, und Ptolemaios, den Dorfschreiber des Dorfes Karanis, und die laographoi [desselben] Dorfes von – – –

To Ammonios, strategos of the Arsinoite nome, Herakleides division and Harpokration alias Hierax, royal scribe of the same division and Ptolemaios, village scribe of the village of Karanis and to the laographoi of [the same] village from ...
